Title: anti-Taiwanese contacts poster
Publisher: Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局)
Notes: From a set of six posters, published by the Zhengzhou Public Security Bureau (郑州市公安局), warning against listening to Taiwanese propaganda.The text reads "Anyone who listens to the counter-revolutionary remarks spread by the enemy will be punished in accordance with the law".The card-players listen to a transistor radio broadcasting "Taibei News" (台北消息).
